stages.logText: I talked to Anakis. He told me, that his sister went into the cave and did not come out again.
I agreed to help Anakis find his sister.
I found a stone statue looking almost like a real woman.
I told Anakis about the statue. He thinks that it is his sister and thanks me for helping him.
Anakis asked me if I could take revenge for his sister.
I agreed to take revenge for Anakis' sister by finding the stone turning monster.
I told Anakis about killing the Basilisk and he thanked me.
